alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of northeastern Ulster, west central Columbia and southeastern Greene Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower with strong gusty winds over Woodstock, or 8 miles west of Saugerties, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Catskill, Saugerties, Woodstock, Kenneth L Wilson Campground, West Hurley, Saugerties South, North-South Lake Campground, Cairo, Veteran, Germantown, Centerville, Tannersville, Quarryville, Glenford, Burden Dock, Manorville, Katsbaan, Shultis Corners, Sweet Meadows and Burden. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 20 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Greene; Western Ulster
